      • searchForAmountInACategoryFromBillLines

        public static int searchForAmountInACategoryFromBillLines(int categoryID,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> billLines)

        Finds the amount's on a BillLine with a specific category id

        Used by categories, that needs to get the amount from other calculated categories

        Parameters:
        categoryID - The category ID to search for
        billLines - The Arraylist of BillLines to search within
        Returns:
        The amount calculated, if none is found returns 0
